net.ropelato.lightdom

Class TextNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ropelato.lightdom.TextNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node

    public class TextNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node
    This class represents an element in the DOM tree. It has a name and optionally an id as well as attributes and children.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextNode()
      Creates a new text node.
      TextNode(java.lang.String text)
      Creates a new text node with an initial text.
